name: Garden Menace
description:
This was my Entry for Ludum Dare 46, with the Theme 'Keep It Alive'

In Garden Menace you need to keep your flowers alive, while animals try to get to them and eat them.

Kill, kick or scare the critters away, to keep your precious flowers safe!

Everything, except sound effects were made from scratch.
Graphics are made by myself, and my two daughters.
Sound effects were made from audio found on freesound.org
Music was generated by a combination of cgMusic and Synthfont.

I hope you enjoy it!
